answers.answer: Greetings Bruce,Sounds like the first problem was a diabetic type response to something:  Have you been referred to an endocronologist? (just curious) and a multiple organ type problem might be explained by something like cryoglobulinimia, sarcoidosis, etc....Kinda rare stuff, but diseases that make the afflicted feel pretty crummy for certain....Keep on keepin on, and read read read (with an open mind) theres a lot of good (and sadly some mis and bad) info on the webJack

question: I have been through living hell the last three weeks.  I have racked up almost $150,000 in medical bills yet no one has figured out what is wrong with me.Right to the point:Started off with extreme thirst, frequent peeing and retention.  Back pain under right shoulder blade in one spot, and also under right rib cage that radiates to the back.
